explanations.machine learning: The paper introduces several inter-related machine learning techniques to speed up the computation of portfolio tail risk measurement.
explanations.regression: The paper uses Gaussian process (GP) regression, a nonparametric spatial modeling technique, to learn the relationship between stochastic factors and portfolio values.
explanations.Gaussian process: The main methodology in the paper is an advanced Gaussian process (GP) regression approach for spatial modeling and learning the relationship between factors and portfolio values.
